description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=2/3. Take the role of Fighter, Mage or Explorer; and save your home village from the evil influence of the Empire of Jem! Fight, cast spells, dig tunnels, recruit a team of allies, complete quests, and develop the village as your home base - everything ultimately leads you to the final confrontation with Gold Rick!
